page.title: 13CHURCHES IN 06200219
page.content: {GREAT HOLLAND}CHURCH IS AT ONE END OF THE VILLAGE.IT IS QUITE BIG AND IS MADE OF BRICK AND OF STONE AND IS VERY OLD.THERE ARE THREE ROWS OF PEWS, LEFT=11, CENTRE=11, RIGHT=12.THERE ARE 28 STAINED GLASS WINDOWS BUT ONLY A FEW CLEAR GLASS WINDOWS.THEY ARE OLD AND SHOW LOTS OF PICTURES.THE PARISH CHURCHES OF FRINTON HAVE THE SAME RECTOR.THE SMALLEST OF THEM WAS USED WHEN THERE WAS ONLY 30 PEOPLE IN FRINTON, BUT IS NOT IN USE TODAY.THE NEW CHURCH HOWEVER WAS BUILT LATER FOR THE GROWING POPULATION.THE FREE CHURCH WAS ALSO BUILT.IT WAS OPENED BY Dr. DOUGLAS BROWN. IT WAS REBUILT BECAUSE IT WAS TOO SMALL. NOW IT CAN SEAT 500 PEOPLE AND HAS 425 MEMBERS. IT HAS TWO HALLS FOR A YOUTH CLUB, THE CLUB IS ON SUNDAYS, TUESDAYS AND SATURDAYS. AT THE MOMENT THE FREE CHURCH HAS NO MINISTER BUT HOPES TO GET ONE.
